author: mrglavas
msg: Adding news of the Xerces-C++ 3.1.1 release.

author: bsullivan
msg: TRINIDAD-1779 Reduce fail-over overhead by storing the token of the current view's state as opposed to the state itself.  This prevents the server from serializing the current view's state twice on each render when full state saving is used.

author: snoopdave
msg: Changing assertion to match new implementation, more entries showing up in search result because we now ensure that new entries get a locale.

author: mrglavas
msg: Updates to the DOAP file for Xerces-C 3.1.1.
